ar: 17.9: - [*] المراجعات: تم إصلاح خطأ عندما كان شريط الأدوات المزدوج مرئيًا في المراجعات ضمن الإعدادات [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/pull/11072] - [*] [داخلي] تمت إزالة إنشاء متجر WooExpress من التطبيق [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/issues/11115] - [*] المنتجات: تم إصلاح خطأ عندما لا يكون عنصر قائمة التحديث المجمع في الوضع المكوّن من جزأين متاحًا [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/pull/11127] - [*] المنتجات: تم إصلاح خطأ عند عدم حفظ إزالة صورة المنتج [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/pull/11124] - [*] المراجعات: تم تحسين سرعة عرض المراجعات [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/pull/11083]
de-DE: 17.9: – [*] Bewertungen: Fehler behoben, wodurch eine doppelte Toolbar bei den Bewertungen in den Einstellungen zu sehen war [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/pull/11072] – [*] [Intern] Die Shop-Erstellung in WooExpress wurde aus der App entfernt [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/issues/11115] – [*] Produkte: Fehler behoben, wodurch im 2-Fenster-Modus der Menüeintrag „Massenupdate“ nicht verfügbar war [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/pull/11127] – [*] Produkte: Fehler behoben, wodurch das Entfernen des Produktbildes nicht gespeichert wurde [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/pull/11124]– [*] Bewertungen: Erhöhte Geschwindigkeit beim Anzeigen von Bewertungen [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/pull/11083]
es-ES: 17.9: - [*] Reseñas: error solucionado cuando la barra de herramientas doble estaba visible en las reseñas en los ajustes [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/pull/11072] - [*] [Interno] Se ha eliminado la creación de la tienda WooExpress de la aplicación [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/issues/11115] - [*] Productos: error solucionado cuando, en el modo de 2 paneles, el elemento del menú de actualización en lote no estaba disponible [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/pull/11127] - [*] Productos: error solucionado cuando la imagen de un producto no se guardaba al eliminarse [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/pull/11124] - [*] Reseñas: velocidad optimizada para mostrar las reseñas [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/pull/11083]
fr-FR: 17.9 : - [*] Avis : correction d’un bug affichant une double barre d’outils sur les avis dans les réglages [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/pull/11072] - [*] [Interne] Suppression de la création de boutique WooExpress dans l’application [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/issues/11115] - [*] Produits : correction d’un bug rendant indisponible l’élément de menu de mise à jour groupée en mode deux volets [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/pull/11127] - [*] Produits : correction d’un bug n’enregistrant pas la suppression de la photo d’un produit [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/pull/11124] - [*] Avis : vitesse d’affichage des avis optimisée [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/pull/11083]
iw-IL: 17.9: - [*] ביקורות: תיקנו באג שהציג סרגל כלים כפול בביקורות שבהגדרות [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/pull/11072] - [*] [פנימי] הסרנו את האפשרות 'יצירת חנות WooCommerce' מהאפליקציה [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/issues/11115] - [*] מוצרים: תיקנו באג שמנע זמינות של פריטי תפריט בעדכון גורף בתצוגה של שני חלונות [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/pull/11127] - [*] מוצרים: תיקנו באג שמנע שמירה של הסרת תמונה במוצר [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/pull/11124] - [*] ביקורות: מיטבנו את המהירות של תצוגת הביקורות [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/pull/11083]
id: 17.9: - [*] Ulasan: Memperbaiki bug yang menampilkan bilah peralatan ganda pada ulasan dalam pengaturan [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/pull/11072] - [*] [Internal] Menghapus fitur Pembuatan Toko WooExpress dari aplikasi [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/issues/11115] - [*] Produk: Memperbaiki bug yang menyebabkan item menu pembaruan massal tidak tersedia saat berada di mode 2 panel [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/pull/11127] - [*] Produk: Memperbaiki bug yang menyebabkan penghapusan gambar produk tidak tersimpan [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/pull/11124] - [*] Ulasan: Mengoptimalkan kecepatan dalam menampilkan ulasan [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/pull/11083]
it-IT: 17.9: - [*] Recensioni: corretto un bug in cui la barra degli strumenti doppia era visibile nelle recensioni nelle impostazioni [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/pull/11072] - [*] [Interno] Rimossa la creazione del negozio WooExpress dall'app [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/issues/11115] - [*] Prodotti: corretto un bug in cui nella modalità a 2 pannelli l'elemento del menu dell'aggiornamento in blocco non era disponibile [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/pull/11127] - [*] Prodotti: corretto un bug in cui la rimozione dell'immagine di un prodotto non veniva salvata [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/pull/11124] - [*] Recensioni: velocità nel mostrare le recensioni ottimizzata [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/pull/11083]
ja-JP: 17.9: - [*] レビュー: 設定のレビューでツールバーが二重に表示されていたバグを修正 [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/pull/11072] - [*] [内部] アプリから WooExpress ストア作成機能を削除 [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/issues/11115] - [*] 製品: 2ペインモードで一括更新メニュー項目が利用できなかったバグを修正 [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/pull/11127] - [*] 製品: 商品画像の削除が保存されなかったバグを修正 [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/pull/11124] - [*] レビュー: レビューの表示速度を最適化 [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/pull/11083]
ko-KR: 17.9: - [*] 리뷰: 설정의 리뷰에 이중 도구 모음이 표시되는 버그를 수정함 [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/pull/11072] - [*] [내부] 앱에서 WooExpress 스토어 생성을 제거함 [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/issues/11115] - [*] 상품: 2개 창 모드에서 대량 업데이트 메뉴 항목을 사용할 수 없는 버그를 수정함 [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/pull/11127] - [*] 상품: 상품의 사진 제거 시 저장되지 않는 버그를 수정함 [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/pull/11124] - [*] 리뷰 표시 속도를 최적화함 [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/pull/11083]
nl-NL: 17.9: - [*] Beoordelingen: Bug verholpen waarbij een dubbele werkbalk zichtbaar was bij de beoordelingen in de instellingen [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/pull/11072] - [*] [Intern] WooExpress-winkelcreatie uit de app verwijderd [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/issues/11115] - [*] Producten: Bug verholpen waarbij het menu-item bulkupdate niet beschikbaar was in de weergave met twee kolommen [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/pull/11127] - [*] Producten: Bug verholpen waarbij het verwijderen van een productfoto niet werd opgeslagen [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/pull/11124] - [*] Beoordelingen: Snelheid geoptimaliseerd van de weergave van beoordelingen [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/pull/11083]
pt-BR: 17.9: - [*] Avaliações: corrigimos um bug que ocorria quando duas barras de ferramentas apareciam nas configurações das avaliações [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/pull/11072] - [*] [Internal] Removemos do aplicativo a criação de lojas do WooExpress [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/issues/11115] - [*] Produtos: corrigimos um bug em que não era possível atualizar itens de menu em massa ao usar o modo de dois painéis [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/pull/11127] - [*] Produtos: corrigimos um bug em que a remoção da imagem de um produto não era salva [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/pull/11124] - [*] Avaliações: otimizamos a velocidade de exibição das avaliações [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/pull/11083]
ru-RU: 17.9: - [*] Отзывы: исправлена ошибка, из-за которой в настройках на отзывах отображалась двойная панель инструментов. [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/pull/11072] - [*] [Внутреннее] Из приложения удалена функция «Создание магазина WooExpress». [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/issues/11115] - [*] Товары: исправлена ошибка, из-за которой был недоступен элемент меню «Пакетное обновление» в двухпанельном режиме. [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/pull/11127] - [*] Товары: исправлена ошибка, из-за которой результат удаления изображения товара не сохранялся. [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/pull/11124] - [*] Отзывы: оптимизирована скорость показа отзывов. [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/pull/11083]
sv-SE: 17.9: - [*] Recensioner: Vi har åtgärdat en bugg som gjorde att verktygsfältet visades dubbelt för recensioner i inställningarna [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/pull/11072] - [*] [Internt] Vi har tagit bort WooExpress-butiksskapande från appen [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/issues/11115] - [*] Produkter: Vi har åtgärdat en bugg som gjorde att menyvalet Massuppdatera inte var tillgängligt i tvåpanelsläge [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/pull/11127] - [*] Produkter: Vi har åtgärdat en bugg som gjorde att borttagningar av produktbilder inte sparades [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/pull/11124] - [*] Recensioner: Vi har optimerat inläsningshastigheten för recensioner [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/pull/11083]
tr-TR: 17.9: - [*] İncelemeler: Ayarlarda incelemelerde çift araç çubuğunun görünmesine neden olan bir hata düzeltildi [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/pull/11072] - [*] [Dahili] WooExpress Mağaza Oluşturma, uygulamadan kaldırıldı [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/issues/11115] - [*] Ürünler: 2 bölme modundayken toplu güncelleme menü elemanının kullanılmamasına neden olan bir hata düzeltildi [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/pull/11127] - [*] Ürünler: Ürünün fotoğrafının kaldırılması işleminin kaydedilmemesine neden olan bir hata düzeltildi [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/pull/11124] - [*] İncelemeler: İncelemelerin gösterilme hızı optimize edildi [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/pull/11083]
zh-CN: 17.9： - [*] 评论：修复了在设置中的评论部分可以看到两个工具栏的错误 [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/pull/11072] - [*] [内部] 从应用程序中移除了 WooExpress 商店创建功能 [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/issues/11115] - [*] 产品：修复了双窗格模式下批量更新菜单项功能无法使用的错误 [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/pull/11127] - [*] 产品：修复了删除产品图片时无法保存的错误 [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/pull/11124] - [*] 评论：优化了评论的显示速度 [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/pull/11083]
zh-TW: 17.9: - [*] 評論：已修正雙重工具列顯示於設定評論中的錯誤 [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/pull/11072] - [*] [內部] 已從應用程式移除 WooExpress 商店建立 [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/issues/11115] - [*] 商品：已修正在雙窗格模式中，無法使用批次更新選單項目的錯誤 [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/pull/11127] - [*] 商品：已修正移除商品圖片後無法加以儲存的錯誤 [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/pull/11124] - [*] 評論：已將評論顯示的速度最佳化 [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/pull/11083]
en-US: 17.9: - [*] Reviews: Fixed a bug when double toolbar was visible on the reviews in settings [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/pull/11072] - [*] [Internal] Removed WooExpress Store Creation from the app [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/issues/11115] - [*] Products: Fixed a bug when in 2 pane mode bulk update menu item was not available [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/pull/11127] - [*] Products: Fixed a bug when the removal of a product's picture was not saved [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/pull/11124] - [*] Reviews: Optimised speed of showing reviews [https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-android/pull/11083]
